document.full_text: spaniards rafa nadal and david ferrer will lock horns again in the monte carlo masters final after the claycourt conquistadors sealed contrasting victories in their semi-finals on saturday.
document.title: spain's nadal and ferrer reach monte carlo final
lines_and_colors: spaniards rafa nadal and david ferrer will lock horns again in the monte carlo masters final after the claycourt conquistadors sealed contrasting victories in their semi-finals on saturday.
